text: Naama Levy (; born 22 June 2004) was an Israeli soldier serving in the Israel Defence Forces (IDF). In the morning of 7 October 2023, during the Hamas attack on Israel, she was abducted from the IDF surveillance base at Nahal Oz near the Gaza–Israel border. On 25 January 2025 she was released by Hamas in exchange for Palestinian prisoners in the second swap under the ceasefire deal in Gaza.Hamas names four Israeli female soldier hostages to be freed in second swap, Reuters, 24 January 2025 == Related pages == * Kidnapping of Shani Louk == References == Category:Israel–Hamas war Category:Crimes against prisoners of war Category:Crime in Israel
title: Kidnapping of Naama Levy
